entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,270Chapters: 20/26Kudos: 252

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega‚Ä¶ Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,124Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 135

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn‚Äôt.No explanations, no goodbyes‚Äîjust the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn‚Äôt understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don‚Äôt need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,636Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 204

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it‚Äôs not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. ‚ÄúYes. That‚Äôs Uncle James.‚Äù

entry.title: Habits Of My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: sunrue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,098Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 368

Summary: "Stiles." His voice came out gruff, lower than usual, "If everything is too loud and you can't find a place to be safe,¬†come and find me. I will be your quiet."For once, Stiles had nothing to say. He felt his heart speed up, felt his mouth gaping like a fish. Derek's hand was still gripping his wrist - it felt like a lifeline. An anchor, keeping him grounded."I will." He replied eventually. He wasn't sure if he was intending to stick to that or not, but he vowed to at least try. "Thank you, Derek." They could both hear the words that were going unspoken, the 'and not just for the ride'. He didn't need to say it.--Or, the one where Derek Hale was suddenly everywhere, and Stiles was suddenly uncertain.

entry.title: Ameliorate
entry.summary:
Author: CottageFroggg

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,249Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 84

Summary: Ameliorate- To make a bad situation betterGranted Stiles kind knew that bringing his best friend out into the middle of the woods to find a dead body was a bad idea, but he didn't expect to find out the new friend he had made at school would show up in a way that would turn his whole world upside down and now Stiles is being hunted by some feral werewolf who won't stop till he gets to him.
